00030 /*

00032  * Lustre is a trademark of Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00033  *
00034  * libcfs/libcfs/prng.c
00035  *
00036  * concatenation of following two 16-bit multiply with carry generators
00037  * x(n)=a*x(n-1)+carry mod 2^16 and y(n)=b*y(n-1)+carry mod 2^16,
00038  * number and carry packed within the same 32 bit integer.
00039  * algorithm recommended by Marsaglia
00040 */
00041 
00042 #include <linux/random.h>
00043 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00044 
00045 /*
00046 From: George Marsaglia <geo@stat.fsu.edu>
00047 Newsgroups: sci.math
00048 Subject: Re: A RANDOM NUMBER GENERATOR FOR C
00049 Date: Tue, 30 Sep 1997 05:29:35 -0700
00050 
00051  * You may replace the two constants 36969 and 18000 by any
00052  * pair of distinct constants from this list:
00053  * 18000 18030 18273 18513 18879 19074 19098 19164 19215 19584
00054  * 19599 19950 20088 20508 20544 20664 20814 20970 21153 21243
00055  * 21423 21723 21954 22125 22188 22293 22860 22938 22965 22974
00056  * 23109 23124 23163 23208 23508 23520 23553 23658 23865 24114
00057  * 24219 24660 24699 24864 24948 25023 25308 25443 26004 26088
00058  * 26154 26550 26679 26838 27183 27258 27753 27795 27810 27834
00059  * 27960 28320 28380 28689 28710 28794 28854 28959 28980 29013
00060  * 29379 29889 30135 30345 30459 30714 30903 30963 31059 31083
00061  * (or any other 16-bit constants k for which both k*2^16-1
00062  * and k*2^15-1 are prime) */
00063 
00064 #define RANDOM_CONST_A 18030
00065 #define RANDOM_CONST_B 29013
00066 
00067 static unsigned int seed_x = 521288629;
00068 static unsigned int seed_y = 362436069;
00069 
00078 unsigned int cfs_rand(void)
00079 {
00080         seed_x = RANDOM_CONST_A * (seed_x & 65535) + (seed_x >> 16);
00081         seed_y = RANDOM_CONST_B * (seed_y & 65535) + (seed_y >> 16);
00082 
00083         return ((seed_x << 16) + (seed_y & 65535));
00084 }
00085 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_rand);
00086 
00095 void cfs_srand(unsigned int seed1, unsigned int seed2)
00096 {
00097         if (seed1)
00098                 seed_x = seed1; /* use default seeds if parameter is 0 */
00099         if (seed2)
00100                 seed_y = seed2;
00101 }
00102 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_srand);
00103 
00111 void cfs_get_random_bytes(void *buf, int size)
00112 {
00113         int *p = buf;
00114         int rem, tmp;
00115 
00116         LASSERT(size >= 0);
00117 
00118         rem = min((int)((unsigned long)buf & (sizeof(int) - 1)), size);
00119         if (rem) {
00120                 get_random_bytes(&tmp, sizeof(tmp));
00121                 tmp ^= cfs_rand();
00122                 memcpy(buf, &tmp, rem);
00123                 p = buf + rem;
00124                 size -= rem;
00125         }
00126 
00127         while (size >= sizeof(int)) {
00128                 get_random_bytes(&tmp, sizeof(tmp));
00129                 *p = cfs_rand() ^ tmp;
00130                 size -= sizeof(int);
00131                 p++;
00132         }
00133         buf = p;
00134         if (size) {
00135                 get_random_bytes(&tmp, sizeof(tmp));
00136                 tmp ^= cfs_rand();
00137                 memcpy(buf, &tmp, size);
00138         }
00139 }
00140 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_get_random_bytes);
